opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 27th day of January, 1997, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED but LIMITED to:
Whether medical literature supporting the view presented by a defendant must be presented to justify a “two schools of thought” instruction?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Daniel L. Thistle, Philadelphia, for Petitioner.

688 A.2d 168

Jan. 27, 1997.
Daniel L. Thistle, Philadelphia, for Petitioner.
